titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.
Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Ms. Cheney demanded that the question be divided on the adoption of the resolution so as to have a separate vote on the election of Chaplain. Agreed to without objection.
Ms. Cheney moved On agreeing to that portion electing the Chaplain.
On agreeing to that portion electing the Chaplain Agreed to by voice vote.
Mr. Jeffries moved On agreeing to the remainder of the resolution.
On agreeing to the remainder of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Cheryl L. Johnson as Clerk, (2) Paul D. Irving as Sergeant-at-Arms, (3) Catherine Szpindor as Chief Administrative Officer, and (4) Rev. Dr. Margaret Grun Kibben as Chaplain.
